mapper.insert: insert into dictionary (dict_id, mov_id, cine_id, dict_start_time, dict_end_time, dict_hall, dict_price, dict_seat, creat_time, update_time) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictHall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dictSeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dictionary set mov_id = #{movId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cine_id = #{cineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_start_time = #{dictStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dict_end_time = #{dictEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dict_hall = #{dictHall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_price = #{dictPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dict_seat = #{dictSeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dict_id, mov_id, cine_id, dict_start_time, dict_end_time, dict_hall, dict_price, dict_seat, creat_time, update_time from dictionary where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select dict_id, mov_id, cine_id, dict_start_time, dict_end_time, dict_hall, dict_price, dict_seat, creat_time, update_time from dictionary
